text: ConexED uses 128-bit, Secure Socket Layer encryption supported by all common browsers.

In addition, ConexED may release specific information relevant to special cases, such as a physical threat to you or others or an attempted breach of security on the ConexED site.

data_type: start time of zoom meeting create as result of appointment schedule through conexed
text:
ConexED's Zoom integration will automatically collect the start and end time of any Zoom meetings which were created as the result of an appointment scheduled through ConexED.
Similarly, when everyone has disconnected and the meeting has ended, our system will automatically record this time as the "actual end time" of the meeting.
When you first join the Zoom meeting, our system will automatically record this time as the "actual start time" of the meeting.

data_type: start time of zoom meeting create as result of appointment schedule through conexed
text: ConexED's Zoom integration will automatically collect the start and end time of any Zoom meetings which were created as the result of an appointment scheduled through ConexED.
When using ConexED's Zoom integration, we collect a unique ID from Zoom which uniquely links your ConexED and Zoom accounts so that we may create and update meetings.

data_type: unique set of credential know as oauth token you revoke at time through conexed application
text: We also collect a unique and temporary set of credentials known as OAuth tokens which you may revoke at any time through the ConexED application or your Zoom account settings.
